snippet: The Russian prime minister said further incarceration of the three women in the group Pussy Riot would be unproductive.
abstract: Russian Prime Minister Dmitri A Medvedev says that further incarceration of the three women in the group Pussy Riot, punk rockers jailed for a profane stunt in Moscow’s main Russian Orthodox cathedral, would be unproductive; says that while he does not approve of their performance, women should be released rather than serve out their two-year sentences.
lead_paragraph: The Russian prime minister said further incarceration of the three women in the group Pussy Riot would be unproductive.

headline.seo: Pussy Riot Should Be Freed, Medvedev Says
headline.main: Medvedev Says Rockers Have Served Enough Jail Time for Cathedral Performance
headline.print_headline: Medvedev Says Rockers Have Served Enough Jail Time for Cathedral Performance
